duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the coordination of all-hazards training in accordance with national standards.
Implement, plan, and conduct all-hazards exercises in accordance with national standards.
Support the instruction of courses and programs as directed.
Oversee the work activities of staff performing instructional and exercise support duties.
Conduct effective liaison with policy-level principals at local, state, and federal government levels.
Plan and facilitate meetings to discuss emergency management strategies and preparedness efforts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Emergency Management, Homeland Security, or a related field (Master's preferred)
